title: HAPPY 5's LF MASTERS+ JG FOR OCAL + ANALSYTS/COACHES
body:
Happy 5's is looking for a master ranked jungler + , we currently have a new roster of all master players in all positions. Required to be able to play on OCAL during 5:30pm mondays and potentially scrims and tournaments on weekends too. We played last monday and came top 16 and currently have 15 circuit points. If you are interested please contact me on discord woodcluck #9329. 

Were also looking for any amateur level analyst/coaches. We only just started last week and if you want to join an organisation that is growing rapidly by the day then this is your opportunity and i will devote my time and effort into you as a player as well.

If you just want to join and be apart of a growing community and has a big passion for esports then message me too and we'll have a chat.
